import { useState, useContext, Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Facebook, Twitter, Mail, GitHub, Edit2 } from 'react-feather' import InputPasswordToggle from '@components/input-password-toggle' import {Col, Row, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, CardText, Form, FormGroup, UncontrolledTooltip, Label, Input, CustomInput, Button } from 'reactstrap' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import classnames from 'classnames' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { add_Purchase_Request, update_Purchase_Request } from '@store/actions/purchase/purchaseRequest' import axios from 'axios' // import '@styles/base/pages/page-auth.scss' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import Paper from '@material-ui/core/Paper' import Switch from '@material-ui/core/Switch' import Table from '@material-ui/core/Table' import TableBody from '@material-ui/core/TableBody' import TableCell from '@material-ui/core/TableCell' import TableContainer from '@material-ui/core/TableContainer' import TableHead from '@material-ui/core/TableHead' import TablePagination from '@material-ui/core/TablePagination' import TableRow from '@material-ui/core/TableRow' import axiosConfig from './../../../axiosConfig' import app from './../../../base' const moment = require('moment') const loginAuthID = sessionStorage.getItem('id_token') const columns = [ { id: 'index', label: 'Sr. No.', minWidth: 100 }, { id: 'location', label: 'Location', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'purchase_type', label: 'purchase_type', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'currency', label: 'currency', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'vendor_name', label: 'vendor_name', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'purchase_Request_Date', label: 'purchase_Request_Date', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'validity_date', label: 'validity_date', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'required_date', label: 'required_date', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'item_description', label: 'item_description', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'quantity', label: 'quantity', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'uom', label: 'uom', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'rate', label: 'rate', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'tax_rate', label: 'tax_rate', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'remarks', label: 'remarks', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'remark', label: 'remark', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'attachment_file', label: 'attachment_file', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'status', label: 'status', minWidth: 170, align: 'right', format: (value) => value.toLocaleString('en-US') }, { id: 'code', label: 'ACTION', minWidth: 100 } ] const useStyles = makeStyles({ root: { width: '100%' }, container: { maxHeight: 440 } }) const MasterForm = (props) => { const { register, errors, handleSubmit, setValue } = useForm({defaultValues:props ? props && props.preloadValue && props.preloadValue.detail : ""}) const [PurchaseType, setPurchaseType] = useState('') const [currency, setCurrency] = useState('') const [location, setLocation] = useState('') const [primaryuom, setPrimaryUOM] = useState('') const [categorybyid, setCategorybyid] = useState('') const [categoryState, setCategoryState] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { setValue("purchase_request_date", moment(props && props.preloadValue && props.preloadValue.detail.purchase_request_date).format("YYYY-MM-DD")) setValue("validity_date", moment(props && props.preloadValue && props.preloadValue.detail.validity_date).format("YYYY-MM-DD")) setValue("required_date", moment(props && props.preloadValue && props.preloadValue.detail.required_date).format("YYYY-MM-DD")) }, [setValue]) const organization = '/api/master/list_organization' useEffect(() => { axiosConfig.get(organization) .then(r => { console.log(r) setLocation(r) }) }, [organization]) const currencyType = '/api/master/list_Currency_Master' useEffect(() => { axiosConfig.get(currencyType) .then(r => { console.log(r) setCurrency(r) }) }, [currencyType]) const purchaseType = '/api/master/list_document_type_master' useEffect(() => { axiosConfig.get(purchaseType) .then(r => { console.log(r) setPurchaseType(r) }) }, [purchaseType]) const primUOM = 'http://172.105.49.15:3030/api/master/list_Unit_of_Measurement' useEffect(() => { axios.get(primUOM, { headers:{ token:loginAuthID } }) .then(r => { console.log(r) setPrimaryUOM(r) }) }, [primUOM]) const onSubmit = data => { // alert("SUBMITED SUCCESSFULLY") if (props && props.preloadValue && props.preloadValue.detail._id) { dispatch(update_Purchase_Request(data, props)) } else { dispatch(add_Purchase_Request(data, props)) } } console.log(props) return (
value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your material code' autoFocus > {currency && currency.data && currency.data.data && currency.data.data.map((detail, index) => { return ( ) })} {errors.currency && errors.currency.type === 'required' &&

currency is required

} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your Designation' autoFocus /> {errors.vendor_name && errors.vendor_name.type === 'required' &&

Material description is required

} setCategorybyid(e.target.value)} className={classnames({ 'is-invalid': errors['location'] })} innerRef={register({ required: true, validate: value => value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter your location' autoFocus > {location && location.data && location.data.data && location.data.data.map((detail, index) => { return ( ) })} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your material sub category' autoFocus> {PurchaseType && PurchaseType.data && PurchaseType.data.data && PurchaseType.data.data.map((materialinfo, index) => { console.log(materialinfo) return ( ) })} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your tax category' autoFocus /> {errors.purchase_request_date && errors.purchase_request_date.type === 'required' &&

Purchase request date is required

} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your validity date' autoFocus /> {errors.validity_date && errors.validity_date.type === 'required' &&

validity date is required

} value !== '' })} autoFocus /> {errors.required_date && errors.required_date.type === 'required' &&

Required date is required

} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your Designation' autoFocus /> {errors.item_description && errors.item_description.type === 'required' &&

Item description is required

} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your Designation' autoFocus /> {errors.quantity && errors.quantity.type === 'required' &&

quantity is required

} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your primary uom' autoFocus > {primaryuom && primaryuom.data && primaryuom.data.data && primaryuom.data.data.map((uom, index) => { return ( ) })} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your mangaged type' autoFocus /> {errors.rate && errors.rate.type === 'required' &&

Rate is required

} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your Designation' autoFocus /> {errors.tax_rate && errors.tax_rate.type === 'required' &&

Tax rate is required

} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your remarks' autoFocus /> {errors.remarks && errors.remarks.type === 'required' &&

Remarks tax is required

} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your remark' autoFocus /> {errors.remark && errors.remark.type === 'required' &&

Remark tax is required

} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your attachment_file' autoFocus /> {errors.attachment_file && errors.attachment_file.type === 'required' &&

attachment file tax is required

} value !== '' })} placeholder='Enter Your status' autoFocus> {errors.status && errors.status.type === 'required' &&

Status tax is required

} { props.preloadValue ? 'Update' : 'Submit' } {/* */} {/* */} {/* { props.preloadValue ? Update : Save } */}
) } const PurchaseMaster = (props) => { const [addform, setAddForm] = useState(false) const [updateuser, setUpdateuser] = useState(false) const [addbutton, setAddButton] = useState(false) const [userdetail, setUserDetail] = useState([]) const [user, setUser] = useState([]) const classes = useStyles() const [page, setPage] = useState(0) const [rowsPerPage, setRowsPerPage] = useState(10) const [searching, setSearchStream] = useState('') const handleChangePage = (event, newPage) => { setPage(newPage) } const handleChangeRowsPerPage = (event) => { setRowsPerPage(+event.target.value) setPage(0) } ///search table data const searchChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const searchstream = e.target.value // setSearchStream(searchstream) // const searchString = searching if (searchstream.length > 3) { const newstring = new RegExp(searchstream, 'gi') const searchitem = userdetail && userdetail.data && userdetail.data.data && userdetail.data.data.filter(item => { return item.vendor_name.match(newstring) }) console.log(searchitem) setUserDetail({data:{data:searchitem}}) } else { setUserDetail(user) } } const onAddClick = () => { setAddForm(true) setAddButton(true) setUpdateuser(false) } const onCancleClick = () => { setAddForm(false) setAddButton(false) } const onEditClick = (detail) => { props.history.push({ state : { detail }}) setUpdateuser(true) setAddForm(false) } const userdetailapi = 'http://172.105.49.15:3030/purchase/list_purchase_master' useEffect(() => { // app.auth().currentUser.getIdToken(false).then(function (Token) { axios.get(userdetailapi) .then(r => { setUser(r) setUserDetail(r) }) // }) }, [addform, updateuser]) useEffect(() => { const {location, history} = props //use the state via location.state //and replace the state via history.replace() }, [history]) console.log(userdetail) return (
{ addform === true ? Purchase Request {/* Please Register for master */} { setAddForm(false) }} /> : " "} {updateuser === true ? Purchase Request {/* Please Register for master */} { setUpdateuser(false) }} /> : "" }

Purchase Request

Search
searchChange(e)} id='code' name="image" // className={classnames({ 'is-invalid': errors['image'] })} // innerRef={register({ required: true, validate: value => value !== '' })} placeholder='Search Updated List' autoFocus /> {addbutton === false ? Add Purchase Request : Add Purchase Request } {columns.map((column) => ( {column.label} ))} {userdetail && userdetail.data && userdetail.data.data && userdetail.data.data.slice((page * rowsPerPage), (page * rowsPerPage) + rowsPerPage).map((detail, index) => { console.log(detail) return ( {index + 1} {detail.location === null ? 'Not found' : detail.location.location_name} {detail.purchase_type === null ? 'Not found' : detail.purchase_type.document_type_name} {detail.currency === null ? 'Not found' : detail.currency.currency_description} {detail.vendor_name} {moment(detail.purchase_request_date).format("YYYY-DD-MM")} {moment(detail.validity_date).format("YYYY-DD-MM")} {moment(detail.required_date).format("YYYY-DD-MM")} {detail.item_description} {detail.quantity} {detail.uom === null ? 'Not Found' : detail.uom.uom_description} {detail.rate} {detail.tax_rate} {detail.remarks} {detail.remark} {detail.attachment_file} {detail.status === true ? : } onEditClick(detail, props)} outline id={`positionTop_${index + 1}`}> Edit ) })}
) } export default PurchaseMaster
